===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A yellowish-brown powder used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to activate blood circulation, remove stasis, promote the subsidence of swelling and relieve pain in the treatment of traumatic injuries with blood stasis, swelling and pain".

Jiufen powder has the following herbal ingredients:

|-

|麻黄
